0.title: Job Status
0.query:
timeseries series.status = avg(veritas.netbackup.job.status), by: { `dt.entity.python:com_dynatrace_extension_veritas_netbackup` }
| fieldsAdd entityName(`dt.entity.python:com_dynatrace_extension_veritas_netbackup`)
| sort arrayAvg(series.status) desc
| limit 20

1.title: Disk Pool State
1.query:
timeseries series.state = avg(veritas.netbackup.storage.disk_pool.state), by: { `dt.entity.python:com_dynatrace_extension_veritas_netbackup` }
| fieldsAdd entityName(`dt.entity.python:com_dynatrace_extension_veritas_netbackup`)
| sort arrayAvg(series.state) desc
| limit 20

2.title: Disk Pool Usable Size
2.query:
timeseries usableSizeBytes = avg(veritas.netbackup.storage.disk_pool.usableSizeBytes), by: { `dt.entity.python:com_dynatrace_extension_veritas_netbackup` }
| fieldsAdd entityName(`dt.entity.python:com_dynatrace_extension_veritas_netbackup`)
| sort arrayAvg(usableSizeBytes) desc
| limit 20

3.title: Disk Pool Used Size
3.query:
timeseries usedCapacityBytes = avg(veritas.netbackup.storage.disk_pool.usedCapacityBytes), by: { `dt.entity.python:com_dynatrace_extension_veritas_netbackup` }
| fieldsAdd entityName(`dt.entity.python:com_dynatrace_extension_veritas_netbackup`)
| sort arrayAvg(usedCapacityBytes) desc
| limit 20

4.query:

| fieldsAdd entityName(`dt.entity.python:com_dynatrace_extension_veritas_netbackup`)
| sort arrayAvg(availableSpaceBytes) desc
| limit 20

timeseries series.state = avg(veritas.netbackup.storage.server.state), by: { `dt.entity.python:com_dynatrace_extension_veritas_netbackup` }
| fieldsAdd entityName(`dt.entity.python:com_dynatrace_extension_veritas_netbackup`)
| sort arrayAvg(series.state) desc
| limit 20

7.title: Storage Server Used Space
7.query:
timeseries usedSpaceBytes = avg(veritas.netbackup.storage.server.usedSpaceBytes), by: { `dt.entity.python:com_dynatrace_extension_veritas_netbackup` }
| fieldsAdd entityName(`dt.entity.python:com_dynatrace_extension_veritas_netbackup`)

8.title: Connectivity
8.query:
timeseries connectivity = avg(veritas.netbackup.connectivity), by: { `dt.entity.python:com_dynatrace_extension_veritas_netbackup` }
| fieldsAdd entityName(`dt.entity.python:com_dynatrace_extension_veritas_netbackup`)

| limit 20
